page.title: 03HOUSES-NORTH EAST:ST.ALBANS
page.content: North of Sandpit Lane there are 3 areas of housing. {1.South of Marshalswick Lane.}Mainly detached houses with large gardens. They are all different shapes and most of them have brick walls in front. There are trees on the verges. {2.Between Marshalswick Lane and Jersey {Lane.}The main type of housing is 3 bedroomed semi-detached. There are detached houses on most corners. Some of the houses have been extended. The gardens are large and streets are tree -lined.There are flats and maisonettes mainly around the Quadrant. {3.The Jersey Farm Estate}has terraced,semi-detached and detached houses. They are mainly smaller and closer together than the others in the area. Most are built of red brick and tiles. They do not have chimneys.
